TopicTitle: Landing Gear animation doesn't trigger on contact with ground

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU | RAM: 15.34 GB

 

For some odd reason, the  LY-99 Landing Gear remains visually in its idle-extended phase even though the craft touches down on the runway. (This doesn't stop the wheels rolling as expected, but it looks like the wheels clip through the terrain.)

It seems to happen rather consistently on this craft that I've built, although it's the only time I used the LY-99.
